banner.text: So much code! Remember you can move all the blocks at once by clicking and dragging on the background.
OK! Now when the hero eats the dot, we want to give it a new position. Open the dot code tray to begin.
Remember how to set the x position?
Connect the block inside your collision test.
Now to set the x position to a random number.
Now to set the x position to a random number.
Connect it to the x position.
Change from 10 to 16
Do the same for the dot’s y value.
Do the same for the dot’s y value.
Connect it beneath the x position.
Set the y to a random number too.
Set the y to a random number too.
Set the y to a random number too.
Change from 10 to 8
Let’s add a sound when you eat the dot. Click 'Add Part'.

tooltips.text: Click on Speaker to add it to your app

banner.text: The code for sounds lives in the Speaker tray.
Grab the 'Speaker: play' block.
Connect it here.
Now find the sounds block.
Grab it!
Connect the speaker and sound blocks together.
Change from drum machine to sounds
Change to Ping
Try it out! Move the pink dot (the 'hero') on top of the yellow dot. What happens?
Amazing work. This is going to be a great game!
